code: import React from"react";import{Table,TableBody,TableCell,TableContainer,TableRow,TableHead,Paper,IconButton}from"@mui/material";import DeleteIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Delete";import VisibilityIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Visibility";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserList=_ref=>{let{users,refresh,onSelect}=_ref;const deleteUser=async id=>{await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/users/${id}`,{method:"DELETE"});refresh();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableContainer,{component:Paper,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHead,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{children:users.map(u=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:u.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:u.courses.join(", ")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableCell,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:()=>onSelect(u),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VisibilityIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:()=>deleteUser(u._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteIcon,{color:"error"})})]})]},u._id))})]})});};export default UserList;
